Join us for a cooperative Deck Building Game!

(Paraphrased description from BGG)

Legendary: A Marvel Deck Building Game is set in the Marvel Comics universe and includes your favorite heros such as Spider-Man, Hulk, Cyclops, Wolverine, etc. Players will choose a mastermind villain (Magneto, Loki, Dr. Doom, etc.) as well as additonal hecnchmen and villains based on that villain's particular scheme.

Over the course of the game, players will recruit powerful hero cards to add to their deck in order to build a stronger and more resourceful deck. Players need to build both their recruitment powers (to enlist more heroes) and their fighting ability (to combat the villains who keep popping up to cause trouble).

________________________

This game is a fresh take on deck building and I have really enjoyed playing the different schemes as well as the variety in the hero/villian cards.

The game is quick to learn and depending on the scheme pretty darn hard.

For more info on the game check it out on Board Game Geek

http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/129437/legendary-a-marvel-deck-building-game

Come foil a Mastermind's plan and save the city!


 Open to everyone. Free of charge.
5 spots available.

Questions or want to reserve your spot? Email wayne@sagesofrpg.com
